snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has raised more than $45 million over the past four years, according to a research group. His opponent, Rob Astorino, had raised $4.8 million as of last month.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo reportedly raised more than $45 million over past four years; coffers allowed him to flood airwaves and voters' mailboxes with messages promoting himself and portraying opponent Rob Astorino as reckless, intolerant and callous; Astorino, as of October, had raised only $4.8 million.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has raised more than $45 million over the past four years, according to a research group. His opponent, Rob Astorino, had raised $4.8 million as of last month.

headline.main: Awash in Campaign Cash, Cuomo Benefited From Big Donors and Loopholes
headline.print_headline: Awash in Campaign Cash, Cuomo Benefited From Big Donors and Loopholes

keywords.value: New York Public Interest Research Group
keywords.name: organizations
